name: Watchmynumbers
overview:
Watchmynumbers is a Business Intelligence tool designed to turn raw data into useful business information. This information is used to produce business reports that everyone can use and understand within their daily activities and reporting.

A WatchmynumbersÂ® report measures profitability, provides advisory alerts and creates Year End Forecasts. These reports also help to monitor performance in multiple business activities, various department levels, and territories within your business.

Their methodology relates more to â€˜visual conceptsâ€™ enabling immediate identification of how your business is performing by merely glancing at our colour coded reports. The WatchmynumbersÂ® Value Proposition is â€œinstantaneous recognitionâ€.

This recognition gives individuals a â€˜feelingâ€™ of how their business is travelling rather than going blind by referring to black and white figures produced in traditional reporting.

Reports also provide documented evidence to answer questions raised, or support various arguments of individuals at important meetings and presentations. Audiences gain instantaneous recognition of messages conveyed in seconds regardless of their financial expertise.

Busy Executives may now receive and understand valuable information instantly while obtaining continuously updated forecasts. Conversantly, individuals are still able to view reports by the traditional method within the system if required at any stage.

Reports are presented in a summary Ready Reckoner format, followed by a detailed examination of each activity area, and aim to make reading business reports easier compared to reading confusing, complicated reports produced via traditional methods.
